dct_alternative_sm: Bartholomew's new map of South America
dct_description_sm: by J.G. Barholomew ; revised by John Samson.
Covers mounted on the 2 sections of the verso of the map when folded. Date from cover.
In lower left margin: The Edinburgh Geographical Institute.
Includes 8 inset maps and shows railways, steamer routes, and "rivers navigable for trading boats."
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Map Collections courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact Branner Earth Sciences Library & Map Collections at brannerlibrary@stanford.edu.
